name: Real-Estate Fullstack (frontend + admin + backend)
postCreateCommand: bash .devcontainer/setup.sh && apt-get update && apt-get install -y zsh curl git tmux fzf exa fonts-powerline fd-find && sh -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ohmyzsh/ohmyzsh/master/tools/install.sh)" && git clone --depth=1 https://github.com/romkatv/powerlevel10k.git ${ZSH_CUSTOM:-$HOME/.oh-my-zsh/custom}/themes/powerlevel10k && git clone https://github.com/zsh-users/zsh-autosuggestions ${ZSH_CUSTOM:-$HOME/.oh-my-zsh/custom}/plugins/zsh-autosuggestions && git clone https://github.com/zsh-users/zsh-syntax-highlighting.git ${ZSH_CUSTOM:-$HOME/.oh-my-zsh/custom}/plugins/zsh-syntax-highlighting && sed -i 's/^plugins=(git)/plugins=(git zsh-autosuggestions zsh-syntax-highlighting)/' ~/.zshrc && sed -i 's/^ZSH_THEME=.*$/ZSH_THEME="powerlevel10k/powerlevel10k"/' ~/.zshrc && echo "# Tmux & Fzf shortcuts" >> ~/.zshrc && echo "alias t='tmux new -s dev || tmux attach -t dev'" >> ~/.zshrc && echo "export FZF_DEFAULT_COMMAND='fd --type f'" >> ~/.zshrc
